title: can you identify this font please
content:
Please can you help me identify this font? Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019133047im_/http:/typophile.com/files/findmyfont_4546.jpg)
author: tracybags

comments.content: Thank you so much! that's absolutely spot on! I was completely confused because the logo uses Ubuntu which I knew and yet the characters are very different to the sample, so I didn't think that could be Ubuntu. Thanks to you now, I have discovered that the logo is using Ubuntu-title which displays many characters completely differently! Many thanks again.
